item.title: Facination with material microscopic view: fabrics
item.description:
In this article, I experimentented with a low-cost microscope and took some images of 3 different types of paper matierals:

I used the microscope on printed paper with ink, paper with pencil lead drawn on it, and a work book with ink printed on it.
